info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:21PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Eddy County through 500 PM MDT... At 421 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Artesia, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Artesia, Lea County Zip Franklin Memorial Airport and Loco Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
